snippet: By rejecting the seat it won last month, Saudi Arabia cleared the way for a replacement country to be chosen, diplomatic officials said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: By rejecting the seat it won last month, Saudi Arabia cleared the way for a replacement country to be chosen, diplomatic officials said Wednesday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Officially Rejects U.N. Security Council Seat
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Officially Rejects Security Council Seat
